name: flexible
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: flexible
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: able to change or be changed easily according to the situation
trans_examp.trans_cn: 可变动的；灵活的；可变通的

example.eg: My schedule is flexible - I could arrange to meet with you any day next week.
example.egtrans: 我的时间安排很灵活——下周任何一天我都可以安排与你见面。

dsense.name: flexible
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: able to bend or to be bent easily without breaking
trans_examp.trans_cn: 可弯曲的；柔韧的；有弹性的

example.egtrans: 橡胶是一种有弹性的物质。

example.eg: Dancers and gymnasts need to be very flexible (= able to bend their bodies easily).
example.egtrans: 舞蹈演员和体操运动员的身体必须非常柔韧。
